about_the_game:
This is a Pre-Alpha Demo for Little Islanders. Gameplay and appearance will change and be improved over development.


Little Islanders is a god game with colony sim, town building and survival elements. Inspired by the classic god games and set in a dynamic world where you can directly interact with your people.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8 or 10 +
  • Processor: Intel i5 2015 Gen or Higher / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or Higher
  • Graphics: At least 2GB GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you can run Unreal Engine 4 games, this should work too! 👍

short_description: Little Islanders is a god game with colony sim, town building and survival elements. You must help your people settle the island that they now find themselves inhabiting. Help them build their town, protect them from the dangers of their universe, and ensure that they thrive!
